# posteR

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

posteRは、APIにhtmlをPOSTするためのライブラリです.

## Installation

You install the development version, install it with:

``` r
devtools::install_github("kbttik/posteR")
```


## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

``` r
library(posteR)
```
